Some updates...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Some updates...
By darklao on Wednesday, June 28, 2006 - 01:51 am:

I've done some updates to the informational pages.

We've now got complete tech/attack lists, although we're still missing a lot of additional data, like what combo types (say, Energy Combo, or Claw Combo) can be triggered, if any, by a given attack, so if you use any of the monsters regularly, please feel free to let me know what combos you've seen triggered by which monsters' attacks. I'm not talking limit combos, just ordinary battle combos.

I also have done some huge updates on the item pages, but there are gaps, so if you're playing, please take a gander over to the item pages and see if you can't fill in some of the missing data. In particular, if you have any collection or guild items, we need info in that section badly, and I still don't have the stable to take those Special Missions, so. Help wanted. ^_^

I haven't gotten around to the equipment yet (massive project), but it's coming soon, within the next week, so look for some updates there, too.

Your tax dollars at work.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, June 28, 2006 - 07:15 pm:

Thanks!

By darklao on Wednesday, July 12, 2006 - 11:37 pm:

Updates to equipment lists, everything but Legend. There are some gaps in Middle and Master (and Illegal, of course), so if you have the recipes and the ingredients, please take a few minutes to combine some stuff and help plug those holes. You don't even have to save it.

Also, I'll get ingredient lists up for all the recipes I have soon, and after that (or before, if you want) any help you can give filling in the gaps would be grand.

Legendary equipment list is in the works.
